Activate F envision

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You use Spellstrike with a non-cantrip spell and miss with the Strike

Effect An explosion of magical energy—stored up for the Spellstrike—explodes out. All creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:5] take 1d4 damage per rank of the spell, with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. This damage is the same type the spell would have dealt, and the activation gains that trait; if the spell would have dealt multiple types of damage, choose one of them. If the damage of the explosion is mental, the save is @Check[will|against:spell|basic] instead of Reflex.
description.value:
A one handed sword almost resembling a long knife made for cutting meat, designed for cutting and thrusting.

It is crafted out of a special and rare material known only as soulsteel - a dark, nearly black metal with veins of silver - that is difficult to work due to its more volatile properties.

Soulsteel pulls at both the lifeforce of the living, and the energy that animates the undead, wielder and foe ailke. A skilled magical crafter can help attune this material to a particular user, usually someone who is a decent mage in their own right, so that it doesn't harm them.

A weapon crafted of this material deals 1 extra spirit damage. At 6th level, this damage is replaced by an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.6llILJtsTPgtYXgx]{Astral} rune; this rune cannot be removed, and it deals 1d8 damage instead of 1d6 damage. At 14th level, this weapon automatically gains a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hebf5k3cd7LO6luX]{Astral (Greater)} rune instead. It is also able to affect incorporeal creatures as if it had the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} rune. However, creatures other than those attuned to this weapon cannot handle it without feeling a sense of unease, and the weapon pulling at their lifeforce. Incorporeal creatures cannot touch it without feeling great pain, dropping it immediately.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6DfLZBl8wKIV03Iq]{Ignition}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Sure Strike}

Craft Requirements You have the magus's Spellstrike activity. Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
